name: Spraay
description: Multi-chain batch payment protocol for AI agents and humans. Send ETH, USDC, USDT, EURC, or any ERC-20 token to up to 200 recipients in a single transaction. Supports cross-chain batches via Chainlink CCIP. Pay-per-call API access via x402 protocol.

skills.name: Batch Token Payment
skills.description: Send USDC, USDT, EURC, DAI, or any ERC-20 to multiple recipients in one transaction on Base, Unichain, Plasma, BOB, or Bittensor. Returns encoded calldata for the agent to submit.
examples: Send 100 USDC to 5 addresses on Base
Batch pay 50 EURC each to these 20 European contractors
Distribute 10,000 USDT equally to 100 recipients on Base

skills.name: Batch Payment with Metadata
skills.description: Batch payment with onchain memo and ERC-8004 agent attribution. Memo is stored in SprayMetadata event for indexing. Agent ID links to ERC-8004 Identity Registry.
examples: Send 500 USDC to 10 contributors with memo 'January grants'
Batch pay with agent ID 42 for attribution tracking

skills.name: Cross-Chain Batch Payment
skills.description: Initiate a batch payment from one chain (e.g., Arbitrum, Optimism) that settles on another chain (e.g., Base) via Chainlink CCIP. Tokens and batch instructions are sent atomically.
examples: Send USDC from Arbitrum to pay 10 recipients on Base
Cross-chain payout from Ethereum to Base

skills.name: Supported Tokens & Chains
skills.description: Query which stablecoins and chains are supported, including fee tiers and contract addresses. Free endpoint at gateway.spraay.app/api/v3/tokens.
examples: What tokens does Spraay support on Base?
What chains can I batch pay on?
What is the fee for EURC?

skills.name: Fee Estimation
skills.description: Calculate protocol fees for a batch payment before execution. EURC at 0.25%, all others at 0.3%. Returns total amount, fee, and total with fee.
examples: How much would it cost to send 1000 USDC to 50 people?
Estimate fee for 500 EURC batch to 20 recipients

skills.name: AI Chat Completions
skills.description: Access 200+ AI models (GPT-4, Claude, Llama, Gemini, etc) via OpenAI-compatible API. Pay $0.005 USDC per request via x402.
examples: Chat with GPT-4o-mini
Generate text using Claude 3.5 Sonnet

skills.name: Swap Quote
skills.description: Get optimal swap quotes via Uniswap V3 on Base. Tries all fee tiers and multi-hop through WETH for best price.
examples: Get a quote to swap 1000 USDC for WETH on Base
Best price for swapping DAI to cbBTC

skills.name: Live Token Prices
skills.description: Live onchain token prices in USD via Uniswap V3 on Base. 8+ tokens including WETH, cbBTC, AERO.
examples: What's the current price of WETH?
Get all token prices on Base

skills.name: Token Balances
skills.description: Get ETH + ERC-20 balances for any address on Base. 8+ popular tokens or custom list.
examples: Check balances for 0xd8dA6BF26964aF9D7eEd9e03E53415D37aA96045
What tokens does this wallet hold?

skills.name: ENS/Basename Resolution
skills.description: Resolve ENS (.eth) and Basenames (.base.eth) to addresses. Reverse lookup supported.
examples: Resolve vitalik.eth
What address is jesse.base.eth?

erc8004.note: Registered on Ethereum mainnet Identity Registry
